course_details.description: The course consists of interactive lectures with students doing sample MATLAB problems in real time.
quick_view: Beginning to advanced MATLAB programming proficiency. This is *the only course* that develops intermediate and advanced programming skills.
Gain skills to solve challenging problems in MATLAB, as opposed to memorizing syntax rules.

courses.course_name: Unit Testing AngularJS: Build Bugfree Apps That Always Work!

course_details.description: Learn how to use Karma, Jasmine and Istanbul to quickly set up automated unit tests for your AngularJS applications
quick_view: Build great AngularJS 1.X applications that will never fail unexpectedly
Gain the required skills to use the most popular AngularJS testing tools, including Karma, Jasmine and Istanbul
Spend more time creating amazing new features instead of fixing bugs
